alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Geauga; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Trumbull, Geauga, southern Ashtabula and southwestern Crawford Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlefield, or 11 miles southeast of Chardon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cortland, South Russell, Middlefield, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Andover, West Farmington, Bristolville, Chesterland, Pymatuning Central, Parkman, Huntsburg, Claridon, Mecca, Johnston, Cherry Valley, Bainbridge and Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio...and northwestern Pennsylvania.
